body: Will you dumbasses quit complainin'? Musashino draws futas, and draws shotas, of fucking course the two are gonna clash in doujins. And besides, futas on shotas? A fucking Musashino staple. If you don't like it, then use that tiny little shriveled excuse of a brain you people have, and put a blacklist on the tags you don't like, Jesus Christ. It really isn't that difficult.

I love Musashino Series, cuz most of em did not fucked a male or shouta in the ass
LoL
@Jazz Boy... I couldn't agree more bud.
